body_html:
@cipri-tom According to Codeplay and ComputeCpp docs, amdgpu-pro driver does not support currently SPIR which is necessary to execute SYCL code on GPU. On the other hand, fglrx is not supported anymore on newer kernels (including kernels provided in 16.04) but it is possible to patch the driver and still get it running but without X support:
https://community.amd.com/thread/202821

On the other hand, fglrx is not supported anymore on newer kernels (including kernels provided in 16.04) but it is possible to patch the driver and still get it running but without X support:
https://community.amd.com/thread/202821
body:
@cipri-tom According to Codeplay and ComputeCpp docs, amdgpu-pro driver does not support currently SPIR which is necessary to execute SYCL code on GPU. On the other hand, fglrx is not supported anymore on newer kernels (including kernels provided in 16.04) but it is possible to patch the driver and still get it running but without X support:
https://community.amd.com/thread/202821
